BUG DESCRIPTION
===============

BUG: Addition instead of subtraction

BUGGY LINE:
    efficiency = (10240 + email_size) / 10240 * 100

FIXED LINE:
    efficiency = (10240 - email_size) / 10240 * 100

EXPLANATION:
Efficiency should decrease with size
Result is used in return value

IMPACT: sendgrid integration produces incorrect results
PRIORITY: P2
